an4.109:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro rukkhupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.109:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivaro?
an4.109:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo;
an4.109:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivaro.
an4.109:2.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu phegguparivaro;
an4.109:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti saraparivaro?
an4.109:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo;
an4.109:3.3: parisa ca khvassa hoti silavati kalyanadhamma.
an4.109:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti saraparivaro.
an4.109:3.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu saraparivaro;
an4.109:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo saro hoti phegguparivaro?
an4.109:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo silava hoti kalyanadhammo;
an4.109:4.3: parisa ca khvassa hoti dussila papadhamma.
an4.109:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saro hoti phegguparivaro.
an4.109:4.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho saro phegguparivaro;
an4.109:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo saro hoti saraparivaro?
an4.109:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo silava hoti kalyanadhammo;
an4.109:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saro hoti saraparivaro.
an4.109:5.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho saro saraparivaro;
an4.109:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro rukkhupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
